amendment.description: Amendment sought to require criminal background checks of mechanics at contract aircraft repair stations, both domestic and overseas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-46 to require mechanics at contract repair stations certificated by the Federal Aviation Administration in the U.S. and in foreign countries to undergo the same criminal background checks required for mechanics and other aviation employees at U.S. airports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 209).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 209).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
